name: US Army Truck Driver Challenge
description:
US Army Truck Driver Challengegame tests your ability to drive in such war torn situations. This masterpiece game will also encompass the idea of rescue helicopter games and the controls will be really similar to it, so you’ll have an idea on how to win the game!
Features
• Adventurous & exciting multiple challenging levels.
• Multiple army vehicles like tanks, containers, army jeeps etc
• Extreme off road stunts
• Character Animations
• HD and Amazing 3D Graphics
